lead_paragraph: ALVY--Susan Weissman, 67, on November 10, 2014, after a courageous battle with cancer. Daughter of the late Evelyn and Louis Weissman. Mother of Rachel and Richard Relkin and Deborah and Scott Semaya. Grandmother of Sydney, Adam, and Sophie. Sister of David Weissman and sister-in-law to Andrea. Best friend and twin sister of Judy Weiss and sister-in-law to Barry. Nieces and nephews Steven and Stephanie, Jessica, Rebecca, Daniel and Becky, Elliot, and Julia. Susan was an accomplished tennis player and enjoyed twenty years as the manager of Rockville Racquet Club. Recipient, 2013 Lifetime Achievement Award USTA Eastern Long Island Region. Attended Camp Robindel, Lawrence High School and Ithaca College. Services on Wednesday, November 12, at 11am at "Gutterman's" 175 N. Long Beach Rd., Rockville Centre.
